tool_description: Cryptocurrency surveilialnce metrics used to identify market manipulation and volume anomalies
name: Crypto Market Health
title: Crypto Market Health

api_list.name: /metrics

required_parameters.name: pairid
required_parameters.description: Uniquely identifies a specific trading pair in a following format: `base-quote`. Not case-sensitive. Full list of supported pairs is in `/dictionary` endpoint

required_parameters.name: marketvenueid
required_parameters.description: Defines cryptocurrency exchange. Not case-sensitive, no special characters. Full list of supported marketvenues is in `/dictionary` endpoint

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the page number of the results to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: end
optional_parameters.description: End of the requested time period, `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S` UTC timezone. **Data Depth:** past week from the current timestamp.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: The order of events: `asc` (from earliest to latest), `desc` (from latest to earliest)

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Start of the requested time period, `%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S` UTC timezone. **Data Depth:** past week from the current timestamp.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to return in a single response. Default is 200, maximum is 1000.

api_list.name: /dictionary
api_list.description: A comprehensive list of supported assets, exchanges, and trading pairs. If no parameters are specified, the endpoint returns a full list of assets.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the page number of the results to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: pairid
optional_parameters.description: Specify a trading pair in the format `base-quote` to check its availability and to see all exchanges that support it. The input is not case-sensitive and should not contain special characters. Leave blank to retrieve a full list of pairs on a specific exchange.

optional_parameters.name: marketvenueid
optional_parameters.description: Define a cryptocurrency exchange to check its availability in our system. Provides information about all available pairs for the specified exchange. The input is not case-sensitive and should not contain special characters.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the number of records to return in a single response. Max is 1000.

marketvenueid.description: The name of exchange or a trading venue
